doc:
Leon Errol https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leon_Errol 0 Leon Errol (born Leonce Errol Sims, July 3, 1881 - October 12, 1951), was an Australian-born American comedian and actor, popular in the first half of the 20th century for his appearances in vaudeville, on Broadway, and in films. Leon_Errol ( born Leonce_Errol_Sims , July_3_,_1881 - October_12_,_1951 ) , was an_Australian-born_American_comedian_and_actor , popular in the_first_half of the_20th_century for his_appearances in vaudeville , on Broadway , and in films .
